sumstate.description: Summary of the states and their formats
sumstate.format: soundMode enum[0=mute,1=ringing](); actionOnRingState enum[0=off,1=on]; connectionState enum[-6=errorProcessing,-5=errorAuthorization,-4=voIPNotActive,-3=errorFavCheck,-2=errorProvisioning,-1=errorConnection,0=notSet,1=ok](); missedCallsValue int[0,65535](); lastMissedCallDate string[dd.mm.yyyy hh:mm:ss]();
